sentences.en: Attendant: No. Please take it over there to the cloakroom.
sentences.cn: 值班员: 不行.请您把它放到那边的衣帽间去.

sentences.en: Do I have to leave all my things in the cloakroom?
sentences.cn: 我要把所有的东西留在寄物处 吗 ?

sentences.en: Excuse me, where is the man's cloakroom?
sentences.cn: 对不起, 男厕所在哪里?

sentences.en: Have you ~ ed your camera with the clerk [ at the cloakroom ]?
sentences.cn: 你把照相机寄放在办事员 [ 衣物保管处 ] 了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He deposited his overcoat in the cloakroom.
sentences.cn: 他把大衣存放在衣帽间。

sentences.en: I deposited my umbrella in the cloakroom.
sentences.cn: 我把雨伞寄放在了衣帽间.

sentences.en: Imes removed his greatcoat from the cloakroom.
sentences.cn: 艾姆斯从衣帽间取出他的大衣.

sentences.en: Is there a cloakroom near here?
Let's get our coats at the cloakroom and not come back.
sentences.cn: 我们去衣帽间取大衣，然后就别回来了。

sentences.en: Master Huang: By the way, when does the cloakroom close?
sentences.cn: 黄师傅: 顺便问一下, 寄存处什么时候停止营业 呢 ?

sentences.en: Patrons are requested to leave their bags in the cloakroom.
sentences.cn: 顾客请将手提包留在衣帽间.

sentences.en: Someone has left his ID card in the cloakroom.
sentences.cn: 有个人把身份证落在衣帽间里了.

sentences.en: This cloakroom is open until 10 p.m.
This cloakroom is open until 9 p.m.
sentences.cn: 本寄物处开放到晚上9点.
寄存处什么时候停止营业 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 衣帽间；寄物处；（英）盥洗室

trans.tran_cn: 衣帽间，行李寄存处，<英婉>厕所
trans.tran_en: The cloakroom at a public building such as a theatre or club is the place where customers can leave their coats, usually for a small fee
